tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Never have seen a doctor who spends time with a patient and understand the complete history. He put you at so ease that you would never feel like a patient. He explained everything very clearly and prescribe medicines accordingly. Keep up your good work doctor. I was lucky to have found you for my consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This is my first ever experience where a doctor seriously looked at all the medical records and studied in detail.  and suggested medicines.even though it was a regular check up for my mom's hypertension and vertigo problem.  we are happy to meet him and satisfied with the approach and medicine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly* ************* *** gathered all inputs very patiently. Waiting time at the hospital is more. I nearly waited more than 2 hours even though booked an appointment prior and was at the hospital half an hour before the appointment time.

I booked the appointment for my mother he doctor asked us to get some tests done the doctor was amazing the experience was very good the consultation went very well he did give required medicines for my mother I would surely recommend him to others in future

This is Ranjani Narasimhan 61 years. Visited Dr. Narendra Kumar for a diabetes and hypertension pblm for the first time. The doctor was so kind and friendly. He is incredible. Not only taken great care of my health, but also he is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It is rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient with outstanding quality of medical care. Spent a good quality time.

Am Mrs Usha moorthy 60yrs old.. it was an emergency when we met him for the first time. I had a heart attack as well as diabetic too. After PCI when i met him for my review, he took his time to explain what he has done for me and given me enough confidence to go with. Thanks to doctor for saving my life. I have routine health check up and visit. i strongly reccomed Dr Narendra kumar for his polite and patience to hear the problems and symptoms.
Dr.Narendra Kumar what a phenomenal person.He explained each and every thing beautifully.Keep up the good work sir
Doctor  Narendra is ** *********  ****** * Very friendly, patient , kind and explained things in detail
Dr Narendra Kumar was very patient and attentive to the narration, clearly explained the reports *** *** *** ******** *********** ***** *** ********** Was very friendly
